about_the_game:
Dread Tomb is a multiplayer cooperative horror game based on Chinese folk rumors. The archaeology professor noticed an inconspicuous slate map while conducting cultural relic identification work, and thus discovered clues to the ancient tomb of the Southwest King that had been lost in the past. In order to explore the lost treasure of the Southwest King, the professor established a special archaeological team and organized a group of talented individuals with some knowledge of feng shui as members to assist in exploring ancient tombs, retrieving cultural relics, and exchanging them for honorary medals. As exploration deepens, team members will also encounter a series of bizarre and unexpected events.

Game Features

Based on Chinese folk rumors, experience the rich local folk style of ancient tomb exploration, various magical mechanisms and monsters, bringing players a unique and familiar terrifying atmosphere.

Randomness

In the game, you will experience a completely randomly generated wilderness map and underground tomb, accompanied by a random weather system, providing a unique and exciting experience for each exploration.

explore

Adventure freely in different scene maps, search for tombs, excavate entrance passages (voxel terrain destruction), explore ancient tombs, retrieve cultural relics, and discover lost treasures.

prop

Various props will assist you in your exploration journey, helping you repel monsters, restore your state, act efficiently, and successfully complete tomb exploration.

trap

Evade the dangerous mechanisms scattered throughout the tomb, unlock the seals of the scattered mechanisms, and search for more rare cultural relics. It is essential to successfully bring back what you have seen to the campsite.

Ghosts and spirits

Faced with the possibility of demons and monsters appearing at any time, you need to remain fully focused, use the correct means to avoid or repel them, and achieve ultimate victory in the battle of wits and courage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960(4GB) or AMD Radeon R9 380 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce RTX 2060 (High settings) or AMD RX5700 (High settings)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
